review:
Hi Dr. Krishnamoorthy Sir!
Thank you for the most wonderful treatment for
My Mother!

We will truly admire the person that you are and the doctor in you is honorable.

The brilliant treatment deserve immense thanks and appreciation.

Sending over our most humble and heartfelt thanks for your immense care and comfort for the treatment..

The most flexible and down to earth Doctor we came across in life...

THANK YOU DOCTOR!!
No words to praise him. *** ** *** **** ****** ** *****. Today my mom is walking perfectly because of him.
